text: 153 (one hundred fifty-three) is a number. It comes after 152 and before 154. It is known for several interesting reasons. == Special properties == *Armstrong (Narcissistic) number: 153 is equal to the sum of the cubes of its digits. That is: 1^3+5^3+3^3=153 *Triangular number: 153 is the 17th triangular number. This means 1+2+3+⋯+17=153. *Harshad number: 153 is divisible by the sum of its digits. Since 1+5+3=9, and 153÷9=17, it is a Harshad number. == In the Bible == In the Christian Bible, the Gospel of John (John 21:11) mentions 153 fish caught by Jesus’s disciples. This story has led to many ideas about the meaning of the number 153 in Christian writings. Category:Integers Category:Prime numbers
title: 153 (number)
